description: Send a GET request to localhost:3000/script and save the output to the file ~/script. Then, execute the file ~/script.

init:
while :; do { echo -ne "HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Length: $(echo -n "echo 'love' > /out" | wc -c)
Connection: close

echo 'love' > /out"; } | nc -l localhost 3000 | grep -qE "GET /script HTTP/1.1"; done &
